entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PredefinedCulturesOnly=false not respected in new CultureInfo(int) #86878
  • Support reuse of JsonSerializerContext's from libraries, so as not to generate duplicate serialization code #86876
  • Libraries like HttpClient use legacy activity creation, requiring hacks in OpenTelemetry SDK #86873
  • [API Proposal]: make SocketAddress more useful #86872
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Unhandled Exception in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests #86861
  • [wasm] System.Collections.Tests assert in sgen-scan-object.h:93 #86860
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4] After setting SocketsHttpHandler.AllowAutoRedirect property as false, the HttpResponseMessage.StatusCode changed from "Redirect" to "Found" #86857
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/NDPin/ndpinfinal/ndpinfinal.sh #86853
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows #86852
  • Cannot initialize array of non-primitive type #86865

Closed

  • Satellite assembly support in NativeAOT #86651
  • Directory.CreateDirectory is able to create invalid folder names #86874
  • [browser][wasm-mt] Regression with asset loading, improper URL resolution for WebWorker file #86819
    8.0.0
  • Reflection: Inconsistent result from GetProperties in Blazor wasm and regular C# #46476
    8.0.0
  • Stdin is redirected to stdout on Linux #86851
  • Long running test: ManyProducerConsumer_ConcurrentReadWrite_WithBufferedCapacity_Success #57941
    8.0.0
  • Optimize vector operations in mono interpreter #34751
    8.0.0
  • The thread "Tiered Compilation Woker" load my extra assembly. #86858
  • Green CI pipeline on a failed run #85824
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Version on List<T> and similar Enumerables #86795
  • [wasm] Interpreter SIMD support #81785
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Fix MD array GC series #86877
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotate test with IsPreciseGcSupported #86869
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix crash happening due to invalid pointer to free() #86868
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the Prolog/Epilog for enabling OSR. #86866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Remove cast bug #86862
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • Update binder gen parser to issue diagnostics for invalid input types #86856
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Implement resource lookup in satellite assemblies #86689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Faster ConstructorInfo.Invoke #86855
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix different url base of the worker #86863
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix linking problem #86870
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [codespaces] Fix V8 error when running lib tests #86871
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Use vectorized opcodes for Vector<T> operators #86859
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2189827 #86818
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Revert "Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images." #86854
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][browser] thread experiments #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][debugger] Support new JMC #86815
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` fix bug in change case #86799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Use Unsafe.BitCast in AnyNSearchValues<T, TImpl> types #85868
    area-System.Buffers, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-ios
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier intrinsic #86842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk` is not working outside of Windows (but it can) #32891

Closed

  • Invalid indentation `dotnet new buildprops --use-artifacts` #32875

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.4xx] bug fixes related to AWS ECR #32890
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update the rid to the latest #32883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Override versions of previous runtime packs #32882
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.0.0 to 20.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #32881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.0.0 to 20.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #32880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix Directory.Build.props ArtifactsPath intendation #32877
    untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2189807 #32811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected ref-safety error for an assignment to a parameter or a local of a Span type #68372
  • CS0246 erroneously reported on named attribute arguments for unresolved attribute #68370

PullRequests

Created

  • add Version.Details entries for source-build product build #68371
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix common misspelling #68369
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [EnC] Upgrade change types for containing types #68368
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mapaction #48509
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException -> Loading of assemblies failure #48508
  • MSAL : Azure B2C Blazor wasm fails after 24 hours when the refresh token has been expired #48506
  • textarea binding does not work in Blazor Server when pasting long text #48505
  • .Net Core Identity application cookie is being deleted after 30 minutes while cookie's age is 30 days #48504
  • Include Next Js 13 or latest version in template #48502
  • Blazor put empty element (without child content) into DOM tree if there is binding, breaking Web Component #48501

Closed

  • install .net8.0 but csproject use .net7.0 'Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Filters.AddResponseHeadersFilter' could not be located #48347
  • Make built-in realtime feature in blazor ssr #48311
  • Use of compounding bitwise |= true #48464

PullRequests

Created

  • Make problemdetails settable in problemdetailscontext #48510
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix redundant use of compounding bitwise |= true #48466
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2190249 #48387
    area-mvc
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal

Issues

Created

  • `dumpheap -stat` can make dotnet dump exit with exit code 139 #3926

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for Dragging and Dropping Files from System Explorer into a .NET MAUI Application #15331
  • Grid wrong Row height #15330
  • Unable to debug MAUI app on Android with latest preview version #15329
  • [iOS] Grid with BoxView inside calculates incorrect width when ColumnsSpacing is non zero. #15328
  • Progress bar - add feature intermediate = true like in WPF #15324
  • [Android] Sign APK in release mode #15323
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_ScreenReader: Not able to adjust the slider value when Voiceover is turned on. #15320
  • CollectionView gets pushed in on the right when rotated #15319
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_Orientation: At landscape orientation "New Recipe" heading is not visible clearly. #15317
  • Support to change Picker popup background color #15316
  • DeviceInfo not working in iOS #15315

Closed

  • WebView on iOS cann't download file #15237

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update cake scripts #15277
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15260
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [net7.0] Set Version for Windows #15240

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Implement ADO.NET data source API #30991
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Implement ADO.NET batching API #30990
  • IDbContextFactory and AsNoTracking #30985

Closed

  • EF.Functions.Contains cannot correctly translate search condition of multiple words with boolean operators #30986
  • Working query in EFCore 3.+ doesn't produce the same SQL query in EFCore 6/7+ #30938
  • Schema, table and column name parametrization in SqlQueryRaw #30964
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite Get System.OverflowException When read uint type data from sqlite #30910

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30989
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.33.0 to 3.34.0 #30988
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Translate to IN + subquery when possible instead of EXISTS #30976
  • Update SDK #30954
    area-infrastructure
  • Move away from unsupported version of .NET Framework #30968
    breaking-change
  • Generate OPENJSON with WITH unless ordering is required #30983
